data.title: Scooby-Doo! Pirates Ahoy!
data.meta_description: This is the tenth Scooby movie. The gang is on the cruise on Bermuda Triangle, but they find a man overboard! That ends up in them catching the ghostly pirates! TBA. data.text:
This is the tenth Scooby movie.

Premise[]

The gang is on the cruise on Bermuda Triangle, but they find a man overboard! That ends up in them catching the ghostly pirates!

Synopsis[]

TBA.

Characters[]

Main[]

Scooby-Doo

Shaggy Rogers

Daphne Blake

Velma Dinkley

Fred Jones

Villains[]

Biff Wellington (Captain Skunkbeard)

Peggy Jones (Sea Salt Sally)

Sunny St. Cloud (Ghost Pirates)

Captain Crothers (Ghost Pirates)

Mr. Mysterio (Woodenleg Wally)

Other Characters[]

Rupert Garcia

Skip Jones

Locations[]

Bermuda Triangle

Galaxy Gazer

Poseidon

Pirate Ship

Cast[]

Voice Actor Role Frank Welker Scooby-Doo

Fred Jones

Casey Kasem Shaggy Rogers Grey DeLisle Daphne Blake Mindy Cohn Velma Dinkley

Run For The Hills

Blow Ye Winds

That's The Way We Go

A Pirating We Go

A Pirate's Life

Home media[]

Scooby-Doo Pirates Ahoy - DVD (September 19, 2006)
